name: Defend the Krusty Krab
description:
Defend the Krusty Krab with your gun and limited ammo. Get access to more ammo (and eventually some extra items) to continue fighting against the malicious Plankton robots that are also equipped with ranged weapons.

W, A, S, D to move, SPACE to jump, LEFT MOUSE to shoot, RIGHT MOUSE to aim

The game is borderline playable - the timer doesn't save properly, the pause menu appears when closing the shop, and the game needs more enemies and purchasable items from the shop to help defend.
